sentences.sContent: They make a trip with a hackney.
sentences.sContent_eng: They make a trip with a hackney.
sentences.sCn: 他们乘出租马车去旅行。

sentences.sContent: Oh! but their removing from the chaise into an hackney coach is such a presumption! And, besides, no traces of them were to be found on the Barnet road.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh! but their removing from the chaise into an hackney coach is such a presumption! And, besides, no traces of them were to be found on the Barnet road.
sentences.sCn: 哎哟！可是他们把原来的马车打发走，换上了出租的马车，光是凭这一点就可想而知！此外，到巴纳特去的路上，也找不到他们的踪迹。

synos.tran: 乘用马；出租马车；出租汽车；操贱役的人

words.tran: 出租（马匹、马车等）；役使（hackney的过去式）
